short_description: This tool performs a conditional evaluation (if-then-else) operation on a raster.

parameters.name: Input Raster
parameters.description: Name of the input raster file.

parameters.name: Conditional Statement e.g. value > 35.0:
parameters.description: Conditional statement e.g. value > 35.0. This statement must be a valid Rust statement.

parameters.name: Value Where TRUE (Raster File Or Constant Value)
parameters.description: Value where condition evaluates TRUE (input raster or constant value).

parameters.name: Value Where FALSE (Raster File Or Constant Value)
parameters.description: Value where condition evaluates FALSE (input raster or constant value).

parameters.name: Output Raster File
parameters.description: Name of the output raster file.
